scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages strategically crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer private customer attributes such as income and location.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to inference attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank deploys a machine learning model to predict customer churn. The model is trained on sensitive customer data, including financial details and demographic information.
